subject: Interview Invitation for Marketing Coordinator Role at NovaTech Inc.
body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for your interest in the Marketing Coordinator position at NovaTech Inc. We were impressed with your background and creative ideas, and would like to invite you to participate in an interview.

The interview is scheduled for Thursday, March 21 at 2:00 PM EST and will be conducted via phone call. You will be meeting with Rachel Patel, Director of Marketing, who will walk you through the role and answer any questions you may have regarding our marketing campaigns and team culture.

Please let us know if this date and time work for you, or feel free to suggest alternative availability.

Best regards,
Ava Lee
Recruiting Coordinator
NovaTech Inc.
intent: Invite the candidate to interview and confirm availability
